entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 10:00 AM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Dewpoint: -5.6°C
Wind: N 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
